snippet: Tokyo Electric Power said it had found strontium-90 at 30 times Japan’s safety limit in groundwater, raising concerns that the plant’s storage tanks are leaking contaminated water.
lead_paragraph: Tokyo Electric Power said it had found strontium-90 at 30 times Japan’s safety limit in groundwater, raising concerns that the plant’s storage tanks are leaking contaminated water.

headline.main: High Level of Radioactive Strontium Found in Groundwater Near Fukushima Plant
headline.print_headline: Japan: High Level of Radioactive Strontium Found in Groundwater Near Fukishima Plant
